info.title: WorkoutTracker API
info.description: REST API for WorkoutTracker - a workout tracking application for resistance training. Built with Symfony 7.3 backend and Next.js frontend.

post.description: Creates a new user account with email and password
Login with email and password to receive JWT token

get.description: Returns list of all 6 muscle categories
Returns list of exercises with optional filtering

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by exercise name (partial match, case-insensitive)

get.description: Returns paginated list of user's workout sessions

post.description: Creates an empty workout session (exercises added later)

get.description: Returns detailed workout session with all exercises and sets

put.description: Updates session metadata only (date, name, notes)

post.description: Adds an exercise to an existing workout session

put.description: Replaces all sets for a workout exercise

delete.description: Removes an exercise from workout session

post.description: Adds a new set group to an existing workout exercise

delete.description: Removes a set group from exercise

get.description: Returns max weight per session over time for specific exercise
Returns aggregated statistics for dashboard display

bearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Enter your JWT token in the format: Bearer {token}

password.description: Password (min 8 chars, at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 digit)

sets.description: Optional - sets can be added later

setsCount.description: Number of sets in group (e.g., 3 in 3x10@70kg)

weightKg.description: Weight in kilograms (stored as grams in DB)

password: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter
